tasks.task: Identify key differences between various quick hitch manufacturers.
subtasks: Note the cross bracing construction (volume and material used).
Compare adjustability features of top hooks (bolt hole positions).
Evaluate the weight of each quick hitch model.
Determine compatibility with category one attachments (requirement for bushings).
Measure the outside and inside dimensions for width consistency.
Highlight color options available.

tasks.task: Assess cost savings from a bushing-free quick hitch.
subtasks: Identify which quick hitch does not require bushings (Spiko).
Calculate potential savings by avoiding bushing purchases.
Discuss the ease of painting or customizing the Spiko quick hitch.

tasks.task: Compare different quick hitch models for agricultural equipment.
subtasks: Note cross bracing differences (strength and material).
Evaluate top hook adjustability (positioning options, bolt holes).
Record the weight of each model (pounds).
Determine bushing requirements (saves money by avoiding them).
Measure outside and inside dimensions (width in inches).
Note color options available (standard and custom).

tasks.task: Assess cost savings from using Spiko quick hitch (bushing-free).
subtasks: Confirm Spiko does not require bushings.
Calculate potential savings by using Spiko instead of others (estimate based on number of attachments and bushing price).
Consider purchasing options from the speaker (shipping available).

tasks.task: Analyze pricing differences between quick hitch models.
subtasks: Note general price points (e.g., good price point for Work Saver).
Check additional costs (bushings for other models).
